name: Albert CROSBY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Crosby v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

judges: MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: Albert CROSBY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of September, 1995, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed. It is further ordered that Appellee’s Motion to Quash Appellant’s Motion for Special and Summary Relief is hereby granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
670 A.2d 1120
Albert CROSBY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 19, 1995.
